name: Succubus Girl Story
description:
You most want to summon the ✟ Succubus Girl ✟. She rules the underworld. You inadvertently performed the ritual and called her to your home. What will you do with an angry beast? ψ( ` ∇ ´ )ψ

FEATURES

  • ✟ Animation scenes
  • ✟ Relaxing music
  • ✟ CG Gallery Mode
  • ✟ Puzzle game

    Easy win:
    Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level

    In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures.
